title: Hot actress Sneha condemns atrocities against Bhavana Varalakshmi - Tamil Movie News
text: Ravichandran Ashwin totally relates to 'Chennai 600028 2' The recent agonizing invasion on actress Bhavana and the revelation that Varalakshmi Sarathkumar made about a TV personality, making a pass at her has the entire film fraternity in state of shock. Actress Sneha has written a letter of anguish wherein she condemns the acts against her colleagues and also the two small girls Rithika and Nandhini who lost their lives to the lust of animals masquerading as humans. Sneha has promised in her letter that as a mother, she will teach her son to look at women with respect and treat them with the dignity that they amply deserve.
